title: Social Psychology Quarterly - Motivation, Legitimation, or Both? Reciprocal Effects of Parental Meritocratic Beliefs and Children’s Educational Performance in China

description: Author Francisco Olivos discusses his article for the June 2021 issue, "Motivation, Legitimation, or Both? Reciprocal Effects of Parental Meritocratic Beliefs and Children’s Educational Performance in China."
